short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for pickcel chrome player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension for Pickcel Digital Signage player on Chrom Flex OS. 
Please use Pickcel PWA app along with this chrome extension to achieve complete functionality. 

Pickcel digital signage player app seamlessly integrates with Chrome OS devices like Chromebit or Chromebox, chromeflex and transform your digital displays into captivating experiences! It's user-friendly, highly reliable, and scalable to meet the needs of any organization, big or small. 

Pickcel Digital Signage features at a glance:
- Supports playing images, videos, live & multimedia content
- Tons of free, editable templates
- 1M+ free stock images
- Flexible layout designer
- Preview-before-publish options
- Built-in graphic design tool ‘Artboard’
- 60+ in built apps and custom integrations
